Normative ethicists who follow the third approach are often called [[consequentialism|consequentialists]] or (specifically in regard to the theory of the greatest good for the greatest number) [[utilitarianism|utilitarian]]s; [[John Stuart Mill]] set out a large framework for a utilitarian normative ethics.
 
Normative ethicists who follow the third approach are often called [[consequentialism|consequentialists]] or (specifically in regard to the theory of the greatest good for the greatest number) [[utilitarianism|utilitarian]]s; [[John Stuart Mill]] set out a large framework for a utilitarian normative ethics.
